text: Combining small changes in diet, exercise and sleep may extend life - CNN
fullText: Focusing on improving sleep, diet and exercise may work together to add more years to life, according to a new study.

text: Scott Adams, ‘Dilbert’ creator who poked fun at bad bosses, dies at 68 - The Washington Post
fullText: His three-panel comic strip was published in more than 2,000 newspapers, only to fade from view after Mr. Adams made racist comments on a YouTube live stream.

text: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms review: The new Game of Thrones prequel is 'very funny' and a 'total delight' - BBC
fullText: The latest spin-off from Game of Thrones tells the story of an inexperienced knight and his cheeky squire. With its mix of brutal drama and plentiful humour, it's a "nailed-on winner".

text: 'Super flu' confirmed in Calif. as hospitalizations hit season high - SFGATE
fullText: A mutated influenza strain has spread across the globe this flu season, worrying medical experts.

fullText: A Chicago Public Schools teacher's drowning death has been ruled a suicide, the Cook County Medical Examiner's Office said on Tuesday.

text: FTC accuses AI search engine of 'rampant consumer deception' - NPR
fullText: Federal officials say a company that operates hundreds of landing pages for AI answers is running an operation that has duped thousands of users, who were unable to stop costly monthly charges.

text: Governor Kathy Hochul’s 2026 State of the State: Your Family. Your Future. My Fight. - Governor Kathy Hochul (.gov)

text: Mom of one of Elon Musk's kids says AI chatbot Grok generated sexual deepfake images of her: "Make it stop" - CBS News

text: Homeland Security Terminates Somalia’s Temporary Protected Status Designation - USCIS (.gov)
fullText: Today, the United States Secretary of Homeland Security Kristi Noem announced the termination of Somalia’s designation for Temporary Protected Status (TPS). The termination will be effective on March 17, 2026.

text: Make Driving Great Again: President Trump Showcases American Auto Industry’s Revival in Michigan - The White House (.gov)
fullText: President Donald J. Trump took office on a promise to revitalize the American auto industry — and after just one year, he has unquestionably delivered.

text: Yoon Suk Yeol: S Korea prosecutors seek death penalty over failed insurrection attempt - BBC

text: Mega-iceberg A23a, formerly the world's largest, turns into bright 'blue mush' as it finally dies after 40 years at sea - Live Science
fullText: New satellite photos reveal that one of the world's largest and longest-lived icebergs, A23a, has developed vibrant blue striations on its surface. The striking snaps hint that the "megaberg" will soon disappear forever, ending a surprisingly eventful four-de…

text: Clintons refuse to testify in House Epstein investigation - PBS
